Key Match Events: Mbappe warmed up on the touchline and waved to the stands
Mbappe came deep inside his own half, skipped past one player and dashed 40 yards upfield
Mbappe was busy and breezy, looking to play one-twos and lift France's tempo
Mbappe had a 20-yard curler that sailed over the bar
Mbappe hared towards the box, slaloming inside and out of two defenders but shooting too close to the goalkeeper
Pre-Game Insights: Experts will certainly hope that friendlies mean nothing after France failed to impress against a well-organised Canada
Didier Deschamps' side were packed with talent but were blunted by a team who had been beaten 4-0 by the Netherlands just days earlier
France will now head off to Germany, while Marsch's Canada continue preparations for Copa America
Post-Match Reflections: Mbappe looks ready for their Euro 2024 opener against Austria on June 17
France's ponderous build-up play gave way to a more direct approach in the second half
Mbappe's first touch wasn't until six minutes after he arrived on the pitch and that was to play a drop ball back to Canada's 'keeper after a stoppage
Mbappe came deep inside his own half, skipped past one player and dashed 40 yards upfield
Mbappe was busy and breezy, looking to play one-twos and lift France's tempo
Miscellaneous Highlights: Canada's press was not nearly as uncompromising against France as it was against the Netherlands
Canada's goaltending decision to make between Dayne St Clair and Maxime Crepeau
Crepeau showed what that know-how looked like, shutting out the World Cup finalists
Crepeau's positioning against a hungry French side in the first half was excellent
Crepeau's distribution helped put Canada's midfielders in good spots
Others: The crowd was initially excitable but soon reduced to Mexican waves to entertain themselves
France's all-round play was so mundane that Mbappe's first touch wasn't until six minutes after he arrived on the pitch
Mbappe's closest he came to finding a late winner was a 20-yard curler that sailed over the bar
Mbappe ruefully shook his head, summing up an underwhelming night for France
